name: Into the Thick of It
description:
Controls:

Arrow keys or WASD or Gamepad to Move
Ctrl or Left Mouse or Gamepad Button to Attack
Escape ends the game.

Description:

My entry for Mini Ludum Dare 68 (Theme: Childhood memories).

In my childhood one of my greatest influences was without a doubt the legendary video game Secret of Mana.

As a tribute I created a small endless hack&slash with my own clone of the famous Rabite enemy. How many can you kill before they kill you?

I hope you enjoy this small game! Feel free to leave a comment.

Source:

The game is Open Source. Check it out on GitHub.
